body_html:
@teng-li Based on the log in https://circleci.com/gh/pytorch/pytorch/266353?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link it seems to be working:

Nov 16 22:15:56 + [[ pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda8-cudnn6-py3 == *-xenial-cuda8-* ]]
Nov 16 22:15:56 + sudo apt-get -qq update
Nov 16 22:15:59 + sudo apt-get -qq install --allow-downgrades --allow-change-held-packages openmpi-bin libopenmpi-dev

body:
@teng-li Based on the log in https://circleci.com/gh/pytorch/pytorch/266353?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link it seems to be working:
```
Nov 16 22:15:56 + [[ pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda8-cudnn6-py3 == *-xenial-cuda8-* ]]
Nov 16 22:15:56 + sudo apt-get -qq update
Nov 16 22:15:59 + sudo apt-get -qq install --allow-downgrades --allow-change-held-packages openmpi-bin libopenmpi-dev
```
